unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Probability of $A$ or $B$

choices.text: In every situation as long as $P(A)$ and $P(B)$ are greater than $0$.
Only when events $A$ and $B$ are disjoint.
Only when events $A$ and $B$ are independent.
Only when events $A$ and $B$ are equal to each other.
Only when events $A$ and $B$ are NOT independent.
